data.system_settings: Android Alpha - latest, Android 7.0 Samsung S7.
data.actual_result: Message stays, preventing you from talking until app is restarted. Switching channels or servers doesn't do anything.
data.expected_result: The "you must wait 10 minutes to talk on this server" message should be gone and you should be able to type in the server.
data.short_description: When given role in server that has tableflip on before your 10 min wait is up, cannot talk until you restart app.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server with Tableflip on. - Be given a role before the 10 minute wait is up.
